001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.BolusPermissionResponse;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.RemoteBgEntryResponse;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.TimeSinceResetResponse;
013
014/**
015 * Adds the BG entered in the bolus window to the pump as a BG entry.
016 *
017 * pumpTime is the ACTUAL pump time seconds since boot, and can be returned from a TimeSinceResetResponse
018 * via {@link TimeSinceResetResponse#getPumpTimeSecondsSinceReset()}
019 */
020/**
021 * Adds the BG entered in the bolus window to the pump as a BG entry.
022 *
023 * pumpTime is the ACTUAL pump time seconds since boot, and can be returned from a TimeSinceResetResponse
024 * via {@link TimeSinceResetResponse#getPumpTimeSecondsSinceReset()}
025 *
026
027 *
028 * <br>
029 *
030 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.RemoteBgEntryResponse}, opCode -74, size 11
031 *
032 * <br>
033 *
034 * 
035 * <table border='1'>
036 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-74</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>11</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
040 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
041 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.RemoteBgEntryResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
042 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
043 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>minApi</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion#API_V2_5}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
044 * </table>
045 */@MessageProps(
046    opCode=-74,
047    size=11, // 35 with 24 byte padding
048    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
049    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
050    response=RemoteBgEntryResponse.class,
051    signed=true,
052    minApi=KnownApiVersion.API_V2_5
053)
054public class RemoteBgEntryRequest extends Message {
055    private int bg;
056    private boolean isAutopopBg;
057    private long pumpTime;
058    private int bolusId;
059    
060    public RemoteBgEntryRequest() {}
061
062    /**
063     * Creates a request to add a data point of the current BG to the provided bolus ID (which must
064     * be in progress; in a state between calling {@link BolusPermissionRequest} and {@link InitiateBolusRequest})
065     * @param bg the blood glucose value in mg/dL
066     * @param isAutopopBg true if the BG was autopopulated from the CGM; false if manually entered
067     * @param pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot the output of {@link TimeSinceResetResponse#getPumpTimeSecondsSinceReset()}
068     * @param bolusId the bolus ID returned from {@link BolusPermissionResponse#getBolusId()}
069     */
070    public RemoteBgEntryRequest(int bg, boolean isAutopopBg, long pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot, int bolusId) {
071        this.cargo = buildCargo(bg, isAutopopBg, pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot, bolusId);
072        this.bg = bg;
073        this.isAutopopBg = isAutopopBg;
074        this.pumpTime = pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot;
075        this.bolusId = bolusId;
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * <table border="1">
080     * <caption>Parsed fields for RemoteBgEntryRequest:</caption>
081     * <tr><td><code>bg</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
082     * <tr><td><code>isAutopopBg</code></td><td><code>(raw[4] == 1)</code></td></tr>
083     * <tr><td><code>pumpTime</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 5)</code></td></tr>
084     * <tr><td><code>bolusId</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 9)</code></td></tr>
085     * </table>
086     */
087    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
088        raw = removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
089        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
090        this.cargo = raw;
091        this.bg = Bytes.readShort(raw, 0);
092        this.isAutopopBg = (raw[4] == 1);
093        this.pumpTime = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 5);
094        this.bolusId = Bytes.readShort(raw, 9);
095    }
096
097
098    /**
099     * <table border="1">
100     * <caption>Byte layout for RemoteBgEntryRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
101     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
102     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bg) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
103     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bg) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
104     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>new byte[]{0} [element 0]</code></td></tr>
105     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>new byte[]{0} [element 1]</code></td></tr>
106     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>(byte) (isAutopopBg ? 1 : 0)</code></td></tr>
107     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTime) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
108     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTime) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
109     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTime) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
110     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTime) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
111     * <tr><td>9</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
112     * <tr><td>10</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
113     * </table>
114     */
115    public static byte[] buildCargo(int bg, boolean isAutopopBg, long pumpTime, int bolusId) {
116        return Bytes.combine(
117            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bg),
118            new byte[]{0, 0},
119            new byte[]{(byte) (isAutopopBg ? 1 : 0)},
120            Bytes.toUint32(pumpTime),
121            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId)
122        );
123    }
124
125    public int getBG() {
126        return bg;
127    }
128
129    public boolean getIsAutopopBg() {
130        return isAutopopBg;
131    }
132
133    public long getPumpTime() {
134        return pumpTime;
135    }
136
137    public int getBolusId() {
138        return bolusId;
139    }
140    
141    
142}
